EmailTemplate.name: Ignite 2015 - HEN LAUNCH EMAIL
EmailTemplate.subject: Ignite 2015: Tickets are officially Live!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Tickets are now available!
As NCS participants, from the areas of Barnet, Enfield and Haringey you are invited to our exclusive annual Ignite event!
This years event will aim to Unite you with your fellow NCS Grads, Challenge you to develop yourself, and Empower you to carry on making a difference.
See the ticket link below for more information.
Date: Saturday 28th November Time: Doors open at 12:30 am Where: The College Of North East London (CONEL) High Road, London, N15 4RU
How can get I a ticket ?
Click here to get your free ticket!
Tickets are given on a first come first serve basis so do not delay!
